page.title: 07RETAIL SERVICES IN A-J-M
page.content: Aston-juxta-Mondrum has no post-office in it, but there is a small sub-post-office and general store in the village of Worleston. There is a daily{milkround}run by a local concern and a{mobile butcher's shop}visits twice a week. There is a van selling {bread and cakes}which also visits twice a week. A{mobile library van provides a fortnightly service. There is a{bus service}which runs three times a week from Nantwich to Wettenhall ( a small village about three miles to the North ) and back again.
